abstract: As its new chief executive, Ron Johnson, revamps its pricing and store design, J. C. Penney announced a net loss of $87 million for the fourth quarter.
snippet: As its new chief executive, Ron Johnson, revamps its pricing and store design, J. C. Penney announced a net loss of $87 million for the fourth quarter.
lead_paragraph: The J. C. Penney Company on Friday posted a fourth-quarter loss on charges to revamp the company.

headline.main: Amid Overhaul, J.C. Penney Posts a Loss
headline.print_headline: In Overhaul, J.C. Penney Posts a Loss
